ModMetaData.name: Misc Robots HP Ext.
ModMetaData.author: Squirting Elephant
ModMetaData.description:
Added a settings menu for Misc Robots++ so you can configure the hp of the basestations of the robots. You can even mess with the settings during live-play.
No longer do you have to worry about your expensive robots getting destroyed by a tiny pebble. Adjust them all to your needs.
Technical details: - Mod is C# only. Source is included. - Can safely be added to an existing game. Your current higher tier basestations may require repairs (one-time only). - Can safely be removed from an existing game. - Is translation-ready. - Requires the Misc Robots 1.1 and Misc Robots++ 1.1 mods loaded before this mod. - Doesn't drain any performance during play.
